meta.name: description
meta.content: Bridgeport ISD serves K-12th grade students and is located in Bridgeport, TX .

figcaption.p: Slimed for a Good Cause - Kids Heart Challenge
Spring Sports Athletes honored at Lion's Club
Click here to view Bond Information website

div.div: An empowering district working together to make success a reality
Wise Health System is hosting a Drive Thru Food Pantry Pick Up on Apr 24, May 1, and May 8 at Wise Health System. Click the headline for details

h3.a: Bridgeport ISD Extends Closure For Rest of School Year

div.div: Bridgeport ISD is extending their closure for the remainder of the 2019-2020 School Year per orders from Governor Abbott.
Curbside Meals will continue as scheduled throughout the remainder of the school year even though we are not physically at school.
Per the UIL, all UIL events have been cancelled for the remainder of the school year. Click the headline for further info.
Texas Health and Human Services has toll-free COVID-19 Mental Health Support Line set up for you to call. Click the headline for more info.

h3.a: Student Online Work At Home eLearning Plans

div.div: Access the online work teachers have provided for students by clicking on the headline. If you have any questions concerning the assignments, contact the teacher.
If you are in need of Tech Support while at home for your school assigned devices, click the headline for information. Someone will reach out to you within 24 hours.
